translation.en: [man] Four-star general.
translation.zh: ‎四星上将

translation.en: There is no rank higher in the United States military.
translation.zh: ‎在美国军队里没有比这更高的军衔了

translation.en: You report only to Sec Def and POTUS, the commander in chief.
translation.zh:
‎你直接向国防部长与总统
‎也就是我们的总司令报告

translation.en: Congratulations, General Naird.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜 内尔德将军

translation.en: [Mark Naird] Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢您 ‎谢谢各位

translation.en: It has always been my dream to command a service branch.
translation.zh:
‎指挥军队的一分支
‎是我长久以来的梦想

translation.en: I have been shot down, both literally and figuratively,
translation.zh: ‎我曾被枪炮击落过 ‎也被困境击倒过

translation.en: but I have always gotten back up.
translation.zh: ‎但我每次都站了起来

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: My old CO used to say that the greatest asset in an F-35,
translation.zh: ‎我以前的指挥官曾说 ‎一架F-35上最大的资产

translation.en: and that is a $100 million plane,
translation.zh: ‎那可是一架价值一亿美元的飞机啊

translation.en: is its pilot.
translation.zh: ‎是驾驶它的飞行员

translation.en: When I was-- All right. I'll skip ahead.
translation.zh: ‎当我还是…行 长话短说

translation.en: There's much more that I could say.
translation.zh: ‎其实我还有很多话可以说的

translation.en: I only wish that...
translation.zh: ‎我只希望…

translation.en: my parents could have been here to see this.
translation.zh: ‎我在天上的父母能有机会看到这一刻

translation.en: But they were unable to get flights from New Jersey in time.
translation.zh:
‎但他们晚了一步
‎现在还坐在从新泽西来的飞机上

translation.en: Maggie, Erin, this is a Naird family team win.
translation.zh: ‎麦琪 艾琳 ‎这是内尔德一家共同取得的胜利

translation.en: -So proud of you. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-太为你骄傲了
‎-谢谢

translation.en: I don't get it.
translation.zh: ‎我就不明白了

translation.en: Dad, when you made three-star, we had 100 guests and a band.
translation.zh:
‎爸 你升三星时 到场的宾客有上百人
‎还有一支乐队呢

translation.en: It's a different administration, bug.
translation.zh: ‎如今的政府不同了 宝贝

translation.en: This one's... a little more chaotic.
translation.zh: ‎这一届要稍稍混乱一些

translation.en: The Air Force chief's house in Arlington is gorgeous and comes with a staff.
translation.zh:
‎空军司令在阿灵顿的府邸非常漂亮
‎还配备了一整套员工

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你

translation.en: Dad, I am so proud of you.
translation.zh: ‎爸 我真是太为你骄傲了

translation.en: -Thanks. -General.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-将军

translation.en: Joint Chiefs in five minutes. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎五分钟后参谋长联席会议 来吧

translation.en: Kick.
translation.zh: ‎基克

translation.en: Get lost, Naird. This is for four-stars.
translation.zh: ‎快滚吧 内尔德 这是四星才能开的会

translation.en: Like me.
translation.zh: ‎比如我

translation.en: They didn't tell you? Or did you forget?
translation.zh: ‎是他们没告诉你呢？还是你忘了？

translation.en: Like you forgot to get competitive bidding for the AT-6B.
translation.zh:
‎就好像你忘了
‎给AT-6B战斗机搞竞标一样

translation.en: Tell me what? That you wear a dress?
translation.zh: ‎告诉我什么？你爱穿裙子？

translation.en: I knew that already.
translation.zh: ‎这点我早就知道了

translation.en: Gender roles.
translation.zh: ‎老旧的性别角色

translation.en: Offensive. And out of date. Just like you.
translation.zh: ‎令人反感 迂腐之极 就像你本人一样

translation.en: But I don't have to listen to it anymore.
translation.zh: ‎但我不用再听这些话了

translation.en: Good luck with your retirement, Kick.
translation.zh: ‎祝你退休顺利 基克

translation.en: And I say that facetiously,
translation.zh: ‎我这句是反话

translation.en: because you're a crook and a womanizer, and I hate your guts.
translation.zh:
‎因为你是一个满嘴谎言
‎玩弄女性的人 我恨透你了

translation.en: God, that felt good.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 说出来感觉真棒

translation.en: Welcome, gentlemen, thank you for joining us. POTUS wants to make some changes.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎 先生们 感谢大家前来开会
‎总统想要做出一些改变

translation.en: He's tweeting about it in five minutes, so let's hope you like it.
translation.zh:
‎他很快就要发推了 再过个五分钟吧
‎只能希望大家会喜欢了

translation.en: I wanna welcome our newest four-star general, Mark Naird,
translation.zh: ‎我想欢迎一下 我们新晋的四星上将 ‎马克·内尔德 前任空军二把手

translation.en: formerly number two at the Air Force.
translation.zh: ‎马克·内尔德 前任空军二把手

translation.en: He's done an amazing job, has a most distinguished career.
translation.zh:
‎他在自己的岗位上表现优异
‎拥有杰出的职业生涯

translation.en: -Our nation's internet in-- -[Mark] Excuse me.
translation.zh:
‎-我国的互联网 包…
‎-不好意思

translation.en: Why is Kick still in the room? I don't-- Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎基克怎么还坐在这里？我不明…

translation.en: Our nation's internet, including Twitter,
translation.zh:
‎我国的互联网 ‎包括推特在内
‎都依仗于我们易受攻击的太空卫星

translation.en: runs through our vulnerable space satellites.
translation.zh:
‎包括推特在内
‎都依仗于我们易受攻击的太空卫星

translation.en: POTUS wants complete space dominance.
translation.zh: ‎总统想要完完全全地称霸太空

translation.en: Boots on the moon by 2024.
translation.zh: ‎2024年前 登陆月球

translation.en: To that end, the president is creating a new branch.
translation.zh: ‎为此 ‎总统要成立一支新军

translation.en: Space Force.
translation.zh: ‎太空部队

translation.en: Which Mark will run.
translation.zh: ‎由马克全权负责

translation.en: [scoffs] Hmm? What?
In close cooperation with Air Force, which Kick will still head.
translation.zh:
‎该军将与依旧由基克带领的空军
‎展开密切合作

translation.en: Oh, you've gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: ‎噢 开玩笑吧

translation.en: [John] This is not a joke. His words!
translation.zh: ‎这不是在开玩笑 总统下令说

translation.en: Boots on the moon in 2024.
translation.zh: ‎2024年前登陆月球

translation.en: Actually, he said, "Boobs on the moon," but we believe that to be a typo.
translation.zh: ‎其实他的原话是“灯乳”月球 ‎但我们相信那是不小心打错了

translation.en: This is bullshit. Space is part of the air.
translation.zh:
‎这简直是胡扯
‎“太空”也有个“空”字嘛

translation.en: Naird works for me.
translation.zh: ‎内尔德还是归我管

translation.en: Uh, hang on. Hang on. I don't think there's air in space.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 太空中好像并没有“空”气呢

translation.en: There certainly isn't any damn water, Admiral, so you don't get an opinion.
translation.zh:
‎反正那里肯定没有水 海军上将
‎所以这件事没你说话的份

translation.en: Air Force used to just be part of the Army, Kick.
translation.zh: ‎空军曾是陆军中的一部分 基克

translation.en: I'd like to stuff you both back in.
translation.zh: ‎我很乐意把你们俩都收编了

translation.en: If there's no air or water, two questions.
translation.zh:
‎要是太空里既没有空气也没有水
‎两个问题啊

translation.en: What is it exactly, and why can't they hear you scream?
translation.zh: ‎它到底是个啥玩意？还有… ‎为什么没人能听见你尖叫？

translation.en: Well, at least Coast Guard isn't last in line anymore.
translation.zh: ‎至少海岸警卫队不再是最后一名了

translation.en: -Oh, you're still last. -Oh, definitely last.
translation.zh:
‎-噢 你还是最后一名
‎-嗯 绝对是最后

translation.en: You're behind Salvation Army, Louis.
translation.zh: ‎就连救世军都排在你前面 路易斯

translation.en: So, how are you handling this?
translation.zh: ‎出了这样的事 你还好吧？

translation.en: I know you wanted the Air Force, and you're not the most flexible person.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你一直想要执掌空军
‎而且你也不是那种愿意将就的人

translation.en: [Mark] I can be flexible if I'm ordered to be.
translation.zh: ‎只要是命令我的事 我就能将就

translation.en: I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first.
translation.zh: ‎我承认我最初 ‎确实有些失望

translation.en: But then I saw this painting. John Paul Jones.
translation.zh: ‎然后我看到了这么幅画 ‎约翰·保罗·琼斯

translation.en: And it made me think.
translation.zh: ‎让我想通了

translation.en: The founder of the Space Force, that's going to be me.
translation.zh: ‎“太空部队之父” 将成为我的头衔

translation.en: This is such a great opportunity to start something from the ground up.
translation.zh:
‎这真是一个天大的好机会
‎能开创一番新事业

translation.en: We're gonna build a huge new base.
translation.zh: ‎我们要建一座巨大的基地

translation.en: Well, DC real estate, the way it is,
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 考虑到华府昂贵的地价

translation.en: you'll be lucky if it's this side of Dulles Airport.
translation.zh:
‎如果能在杜勒斯机场的这一面
‎你就算走运的了

translation.en: Oh, well, it's definitely gonna be on the other side of Dulles.
translation.zh:
‎别想咯 只可能会在机场的那一面
‎西弗吉尼亚州…

translation.en: By about 2,000 miles.
translation.zh: ‎再向西三千多公里吧

translation.en: -We're going to Colorado. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-一直到科罗拉多州
‎-啥？

translation.en: There's this old NORAD facility that's got a lot of potential.
translation.zh: ‎那边有一座北美空防司令部的旧设施 ‎挺有潜力的 更别说科罗拉多了

translation.en: And Colorado? Oh!
translation.zh: ‎挺有潜力的 更别说科罗拉多了

translation.en: Up and coming.
translation.zh: ‎绝对有前途 你知道不

translation.en: Did you know Amazon put their new headquarters there?
translation.zh: ‎亚马逊都把新总部放在那里了？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？

translation.en: No. But they seriously considered it.
translation.zh: ‎不是 但他们有很认真地考虑过

translation.en: You and Erin are gonna love it there.
translation.zh: ‎你和艾琳肯定会喜欢那里的

translation.en: -Gonna learn how to ride horses. -[sobs]
translation.zh: ‎学学怎么骑马呀

translation.en: [Mark] It's gonna be a good year.
translation.zh: ‎今年会是个好年头

translation.en: And next year at this time...
translation.zh: ‎而且啊 到了明年这时候…

translation.en: we might have boots on the moon.
translation.zh: ‎我们可能已经登陆月球了

translation.en: Big launch today, huh?
translation.zh: ‎（科罗拉多州 野马村） ‎发射的大日子 嗯？

translation.en: Launch?
translation.zh: ‎发射？

translation.en: At the new base.
translation.zh: ‎新基地里啊

translation.en: What base?
translation.zh: ‎什么基地？

translation.en: Oh, right. It's a secret.
translation.zh: ‎对哦 这是机密

translation.en: If you told me, you'd have to kill me, right? [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎如果告诉我的话
‎你就得杀我灭口 对吧？

translation.en: ♪ That's what I wanted to be ♪
translation.zh: ‎（私有领地 严禁擅闯）

translation.en: ♪ But now that I am a spaceman ♪
translation.zh: ‎（掉头）

translation.en: -[Mark] Hey. -Sir.
There's a guy in the trunk. Hold him till after the launch.
translation.zh:
‎后备箱里有个家伙
‎关到发射完之后再放走

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: ‎遵命 长官

translation.en: What the fuck, man?
translation.zh: ‎搞什么鬼啊？

translation.en: So then you say do bat your eye--
translation.zh: ‎然后你说 眨眨眼睛…

translation.en: -Big launch today, sir. -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-发射的大日子啊 长官
‎-是的

translation.en: The congressional delegation will be arriving for lunch.
translation.zh: ‎国会代表团会过来用午餐

translation.en: You have to speak for ten minutes -at the local high school. -[sighs]
translation.zh:
‎您要去本地的高中
‎做一段十分钟的演讲

translation.en: Don't worry. We have a new helo pilot.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 来了个新直升机飞行员

translation.en: We'll get you in and out of there in no time.
translation.zh: ‎我们会确保您去去就回

translation.en: And the launch at 1700
translation.zh: ‎发射时间定在幺拐洞洞

translation.en: is set to be a live feed on the East Coast.
translation.zh: ‎将全程向东海岸直播

translation.en: You have a light day today, so you can start in the gym,
translation.zh:
‎今天的行程不太满
‎所以您可以从健身开始

translation.en: and your calendar says it's a leg day.
translation.zh: ‎日历上说今天是“练腿日”

translation.en: Dr. Mallory.
translation.zh: ‎马洛里博士

translation.en: Oh! Dr. Mallory is waiting for you.
translation.zh: ‎马洛里博士在等您

translation.en: Yes, he is.
translation.zh: ‎对 是这样的

translation.en: -He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.zh:
‎-他叫我什么也别说的
‎-我谢你啊 布拉德

translation.en: [Mallory] We need to cancel the launch.
translation.zh: ‎我们得把发射给取消了

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: ‎不行

translation.en: Senator Schugler, Pitosi,
translation.zh: ‎参议员舒蘑和佩驼西

translation.en: and the angry young congresswoman are coming.
translation.zh: ‎还有那个愤怒的年轻女众议员要来

translation.en: They need to see a success so we can keep our funding.
translation.zh:
‎必须让他们看到我们的成功
‎这样才能保住拨款

translation.en: Oh. My idea of success
translation.zh: ‎我对成功的定义

translation.en: would not be a six-billion-dollar piece of hardware
translation.zh: ‎可不是让一件价值六十亿的设备

translation.en: breaking up over Denver.
translation.zh: ‎在丹佛上空支离破碎

translation.en: That is not going to happen.
translation.zh: ‎不会发生这样的事

translation.en: Look, I don't like to pull rank,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我不喜欢拿职权压人

translation.en: -but I order you to postpone the launch. -Ah...
translation.zh: ‎但我现在要命令你将发射延后

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: ‎明白吗？

translation.en: There's too much moisture in the air.
translation.zh: ‎今天空气里的湿度太大了

translation.en: We prefer a less ionized environment.
translation.zh: ‎电离化少一些的环境 会更适宜发射

translation.en: You are a civilian advisor.
translation.zh: ‎你就只是个文职顾问而已

translation.en: There are always going to be risks.
translation.zh: ‎风险不可避免

translation.en: Conditions are never perfect.
translation.zh: ‎状况永远达不到完美

translation.en: They're supposed to be perfect tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎明天的状况就应该会是完美的

translation.en: The delegation will be back in Washington tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎明天代表团已经打道回华府了

translation.en: -You know, Mark, when I hired you... -I hired you.
translation.zh: ‎你知道么 马克 当初我雇你时… ‎是我雇了你

translation.en: ...I felt your best quality was your ability to listen to good advice.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你的最大优点 ‎就是你能听得进忠告

translation.en: If you've lost that,
translation.zh: ‎如果你连这点也丢了

translation.en: we may have to look elsewhere.
translation.zh: ‎那我们就只能另请高明了

translation.en: We. Who is this "we" that you keep talking about?
translation.zh: ‎“我们” 你老挂在嘴边的这个“我们” ‎到底指的是谁啊？

translation.en: That is above your pay grade.
translation.zh: ‎这事不在你的职权范围之内

translation.en: Nothing is above my pay grade at this base.
translation.zh:
‎在这座基地里
‎就没有在我职权范围之外的事

translation.en: Just postpone the launch, dear.
translation.zh: ‎把发射推后吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: ‎没门

translation.en: So, no launch today, I hear.
translation.zh: ‎今天不发射了呀 我听说

translation.en: No, launch is still on.
translation.zh: ‎不 发射照常进行

translation.en: Oh. I'll have to tell the base biologist.
translation.zh: ‎那我得告诉基地的生物学家

translation.en: -What? -She has to collect
translation.zh:
‎-啥？
‎-她得去把发射场方圆550米内

translation.en: all the endangered lizards within 600 yards of the launch site.
translation.zh:
‎-啥？
‎-她得去把发射场方圆550米内 ‎所有的濒危蜥蜴都给搜集回来

translation.en: I canceled her because Mallory told me the launch was scrubbed.
translation.zh:
‎马洛里跟我说发射被取消了
‎我才叫她不用来的

translation.en: No! Nobody gets to scrub anything but me.
translation.zh:
‎不！除我之外
‎没人有权利取消任何东西

translation.en: Oh. Got it, sir.
translation.zh: ‎明白了 长官

translation.en: Hello, Yuri.
translation.zh: ‎你好 尤里

translation.en: Oh. Uh, Yuri's in there.
translation.zh: ‎对了 尤里在里面

translation.en: -I know. -He told me not to say anything.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道了
‎-他叫我什么也别说的

translation.en: Thank you, Brad.
translation.zh: ‎我谢你啊 布拉德

translation.en: [with Russian accent] Do you keep breath mints anywhere?
translation.zh: ‎你这边有薄荷糖么？

translation.en: What are you doing in here?
translation.zh: ‎你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Um, I heard the launch was scrubbed.
translation.zh: ‎我听说发射被取消了

translation.en: That is not accurate, Yuri.
translation.zh: ‎这说法不准确 尤里

translation.en: Call me Bobby. It's more reassuring.
translation.zh: ‎还是叫我鲍比吧 比较让人放心点

translation.en: Can I see technical specifications for the Epsilon part E-16f fuel pump?
translation.zh:
‎能让我看一下艾瑟伦的零件
‎E-16f号燃料泵的技术参数么？

translation.en: Why would you need to see that?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要看？

translation.en: Well, as observer from ISS partner country,
translation.zh:
‎这个嘛
‎作为国际空间站伙伴国的观察员

translation.en: I just want to... observe it.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想观察观察呗

translation.en: Hmm. Well, that is weird.
translation.zh: ‎这可真够奇怪的

translation.en: Your president desires close cooperation and good relations between US and Russia.
translation.zh:
‎你们的总统想要美国与俄国
‎进行紧密合作 建立良好关系

translation.en: Come on. We're not China here.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我们又不是中国咯

translation.en: I'm sure if the president would like me to show you something,
translation.zh:
‎我相信如果总统想让我
‎给你看点东西的话

translation.en: he will let me know.
translation.zh: ‎他会告知我的

translation.en: Very well.
translation.zh: ‎非常好

translation.en: Expect a text from the secure phone.
translation.zh: ‎等着收一条来自保密电话的信息吧

translation.en: How do you know about the secure phone?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道保密电话的事？

translation.en: I don't know about the secure phone.
translation.zh: ‎什么秘密电话 我不知道啊

translation.en: -You just said "secure phone." -No, I didn't.
translation.zh:
‎-你刚才自己说“保密电话”的
‎-不 我没有

translation.en: -Yes, you did. You said "secure phone." -I didn't say that.
translation.zh:
‎-有 你说了“保密电话”
‎-我没这么说

translation.en: You just said it.
translation.zh: ‎你绝对说了

translation.en: -No, I did not. -Yes, you did.
translation.zh:
‎-不 我没有
‎-有 你说了

translation.en: Breath mints.
translation.zh: ‎薄荷糖

translation.en: Here they are.
translation.zh: ‎原来在这里呀

translation.en: [sergeant] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
translation.zh: ‎我虽不懂但我有听说

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ I don't know but I been told ♪
translation.zh: ‎我虽不懂但我有听说

translation.en: [sergeant] ♪ Outer space is very cold ♪
translation.zh: ‎外太空冻得人直哆嗦

translation.en: [soldiers] ♪ Outer space is very cold... ♪
translation.zh: ‎外太空冻得人直哆嗦

translation.en: Had a little chopper trouble.
translation.zh: ‎直升机出了点小问题

translation.en: So, uh, what's good here?
translation.zh: ‎这边都有什么好吃的？

translation.en: I would recommend the tuna.
translation.zh: ‎我推荐金枪鱼

translation.en: Sushi?
translation.zh: ‎寿司？

translation.en: How much are taxpayers paying to fly that in?
translation.zh:
‎把新鲜鱼肉空运进来
‎纳税人得花多少钱啊？

translation.en: A sandwich.
translation.zh: ‎罐头做的三明治

translation.en: I knew that. It was a joke.
translation.zh: ‎我知道啊 开个玩笑而已

translation.en: And a good one.
translation.zh: ‎挺好笑的

translation.en: But with a grain of truth.
translation.zh: ‎却也有几分真

translation.en: Kick Grabaston at Air Force told us confidentially
translation.zh:
‎空军的基克·格拉巴斯顿
‎私下跟我们说了

translation.en: that this base was a complete waste of money.
translation.zh: ‎这座基地纯粹是浪费金钱的东西

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I assure you we are on track,
translation.zh:
‎女士们、先生们 我向你们保证
‎一切都如期进行

translation.en: and Epsilon will launch at 1700 hours.
translation.zh: ‎艾瑟伦将在幺拐洞洞准时发射

translation.en: And the Epsilon is the new spacecraft fighter, right?
translation.zh:
‎艾瑟伦就是那架
‎新型太空战斗飞船 对吧？

translation.en: That is correct.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: What kind of armament will it have on board?
translation.zh: ‎那它将装备怎样的武器呀？

translation.en: Laser cannon? Pulse weapon?
translation.zh: ‎激光炮？脉冲武器？

translation.en: I believe those are from Star Wars.
translation.zh: ‎这些都是《星球大战》里的吧？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: ‎是

translation.en: But if I had a laser cannon,
translation.zh: ‎不过啊 要是… ‎我有一架激光炮的话

translation.en: I would probably use it to cook a Wendy's hamburger.
translation.zh:
‎估计我会用它来
‎把温蒂汉堡的新产品再烧熟一点

translation.en: The Epsilon is equipped with a kinetic disabling system.
translation.zh: ‎艾瑟伦装备了一套动能钳制系统

translation.en: -Meaning? -It can eject a metal net,
translation.zh:
‎-就是说？
‎-它能发射出一张金属网来

translation.en: and it is our hope that we can get this net
translation.zh:
‎如果一切顺利的话
‎我们希望能通过这张网

translation.en: to tangle with enemy satellites.
translation.zh: ‎来缠住敌方的卫星

translation.en: Exploding them?
translation.zh: ‎使其爆炸？

translation.en: Tangling them.
translation.zh: ‎缠住而已

translation.en: This better be one fucking flawless launch.
translation.zh: ‎今天的发射最好能他妈的完美无瑕

translation.en: Six billion for a net.
translation.zh: ‎六十亿就换了一张网

translation.en: Not a good look.
translation.zh: ‎说出去脸上无光啊

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: ‎不好意思

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: Oh, God. I have to take this.
translation.zh: ‎噢 天呐 这电话我必须得接

translation.en: Dad, is everything all right?
translation.zh: ‎爸 一切都好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, only your mom has run off again.
translation.zh: ‎好呀 只不过你妈又走丢了

translation.en: I can't see her. I'd run after her,
translation.zh: ‎没见着她人 本来我会去找的

translation.en: but I think I had a small heart attack this morning.
translation.zh: ‎但我今早好像心脏病发作了一小下

translation.en: You know, I'm feeling a little draggy.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 我感觉自己有点迟钝

translation.en: Okay, Dad, is the caretaker there? Please put the caretaker on.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 爸 护工在吗？让他接电话

translation.en: He's on his way. He should be here any minute.
translation.zh: ‎他在路上了 应该很快就到

translation.en: So how's the lady situation?
translation.zh: ‎你的感情生活还可以吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Well, as you know, my wife is in prison.
translation.zh: ‎这个啊 如你所知 我的妻子进监狱了

translation.en: Uh-huh. You know what I had to do yesterday?
translation.zh: ‎你猜我昨天干了啥？

translation.en: I had to crawl under the house to check a leak.
translation.zh:
‎我不得不钻到房子底下去
‎检查哪里漏了

translation.en: No, Dad. Dad, don't do--
translation.zh: ‎不行啊 爸 爸你别这么做…

translation.en: We have people to crawl under the house, Dad.
translation.zh:
‎钻到房子底下这种事
‎是请别人来做的 爸

translation.en: I crawled under. I didn't tell anybody, and they didn't know I was under there.
translation.zh:
‎我爬到下面去过了 谁也没告诉
‎他们都不知道我跑下面去了

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: Please, Dad, don't, don't-- Don't crawl under the house!
translation.zh:
‎求你了 爸 别…
‎别再钻到房子底下去了！

translation.en: So how's things? How's your-- How's your wife?
translation.zh: ‎你过得怎么样啊？你的… ‎你的妻子怎么样啦？

translation.en: She's fine.
translation.zh: ‎她挺好的

translation.en: Yeah, you two are gonna make a great couple.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 你们两口子以后肯定会很美满的

translation.en: -Is the caretaker there, Dad? -Uh, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎护工到了吗 爸？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Put the caretaker on.
translation.zh:
‎-您跑到房子外来干嘛啊？
‎-爸 让护工接

translation.en: -Have to get in the house. -What? -Put the caretaker on. -Get in the house.
translation.zh:
‎-您必须待在房子里
‎-把电话给护工 爸

translation.en: He wants to talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎哦 他想跟你讲话

translation.en: Oh, God. I don't know what to do.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 我也不知道该怎么办

translation.en: Your father should be in the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎您父亲应该待在医院里

translation.en: Your mama is somewhere in the streets in her nightgown.
translation.zh:
‎您妈妈穿着睡袍
‎不晓得跑到街上哪里去了

translation.en: Can you come home and help me?
translation.zh: ‎您能回家来帮帮我吗？

translation.en: I wish I could, Jean Baptiste, but I'm having kind of a day of it myself.
translation.zh:
‎我也想啊 让-巴蒂斯特
‎但我今天过得也很不顺

translation.en: And, please, don't let my dad go under the house again.
translation.zh:
‎另外我求你了
‎千万别再让我爸钻到房子底下去

translation.en: I try. You know he do whatever he want.
translation.zh:
‎我尽力了
‎您知道他总由着自己性子来

translation.en: -No, no, no, no! -Ask him...
translation.zh:
‎-不行！
‎-问问他…

translation.en: You have to keep eyes on him. Do you understand?
translation.zh: ‎你必须把他给盯好了 明白吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Mr. Naird. -Ask him how his wife is.
translation.zh:
‎-是 内尔德先生
‎-问问他妻子还好吗？

translation.en: -How is your wife? -Ugh, God.
translation.zh: ‎您妻子还好吗？

translation.en: All right, hold on a second, Jean Baptiste.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 好吧 等一下 让-巴蒂斯特

translation.en: Brad, I'm going to need you to task the satellite
translation.zh: ‎布拉德 我需要你再次把卫星定位到

translation.en: -over Nutley, New Jersey, again. -Yes, I'm on it.
translation.zh:
‎-新泽西州的纳特利
‎-是 我这就办

translation.en: She's in the Rite-Aid parking lot.
translation.zh: ‎她在来德爱药房的停车场里

translation.en: -Text me when she's in the car. -Okay. Thank you, Mr. Naird.
translation.zh:
‎-等她上车了再给我发条信息
‎-好的 谢谢您 内尔德先生

translation.en: [man] Oh, he is blowing it just like you thought.
translation.zh:
‎噢 他完全是在胡搞瞎搞
‎就跟你预料的一样

translation.en: Yeah, it is a complete shit show.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 完全是一团糟

translation.en: My dry cleaner.
translation.zh: ‎说我用的干洗店呢

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, they, uh, they lost my dress whites.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 他们把我的白军服给弄丢了

translation.en: -I canceled the launch. -[gasps]
translation.zh: ‎我把发射取消掉了

translation.en: [panting] Mallory's waiting for you.
translation.zh: ‎马洛里在等您呢

translation.en: -He said not to say anything. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.zh:
‎-他叫我什么也别说
‎-我谢你啊 布拉德

translation.en: -I didn't say anything. -Well done, Bradley.
translation.zh:
‎-我什么也没说
‎-干得好 布拉德

translation.en: -Oh, thank you, sir. -[Mark exhales]
translation.zh: ‎噢 谢谢您 先生

translation.en: It's a six-billion-dollar decision.
translation.zh: ‎这可是一个关乎六十亿的决定

translation.en: We can't risk it.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能冒这个险

translation.en: It's a lot for a scientist,
translation.zh: ‎对科学家来说 这确实挺冒险的

translation.en: but in the military, we have to risk lives.
translation.zh:
‎但在军队里
‎我们连性命都可以拿来冒险

translation.en: At 50 grand a year,
translation.zh: ‎一年挣五万的话

translation.en: it would take 120,000 years to earn $6 billion.
translation.zh: ‎要花十二万年才能挣到六十亿

translation.en: That is the entire lifetime earnings of 3,000 people.
translation.zh: ‎这相当于三千个人终身收入的总和

translation.en: Now, how many times can a country waste the entire lifetime earnings
translation.zh:
‎告诉我 这种无故浪费
‎数千公民终身收入的事情

translation.en: of thousands of its citizens without something really bad happening?
translation.zh: ‎一个国家能承受得了几回？ ‎这样能不出大事吗？

translation.en: Are you still upset about the button covers?
translation.zh: ‎你还在为按钮罩的那件事生气啊？

translation.en: A thousand dollars for a plastic button cover?
translation.zh: ‎在一个破塑料按钮罩上花一千元？

translation.en: That's insane!
translation.zh: ‎简直不可理喻！

translation.en: -So you think we'll be ready by Novem-- -[button clicks]
translation.zh: ‎就是说你认为我们11月前能准…

translation.en: -[automated voice] Three. -[alarms blaring]
translation.zh: ‎三

translation.en: -Two. -Shit.
translation.zh:
‎-二
‎-糟糕

translation.en: One.
translation.zh: ‎一

translation.en: [rocket engine whooshing]
translation.zh: ‎（发射程序已启动）

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎对不起

translation.en: How many times do I need to apologize?
translation.zh: ‎我要道几回歉才够啊？

translation.en: Just come out to the launch site and we'll show you.
translation.zh: ‎到外面的发射场来 让我们将给你听

translation.en: The proper humidity for launch is 40 percent.
translation.zh: ‎发射所需的适宜湿度在40%以下

translation.en: Today it is at 54 percent.
translation.zh: ‎今天的湿度是54%

translation.en: This can affect oxygenation and fuel burn.
translation.zh: ‎这会影响到增氧过程和燃料消耗

translation.en: [Mark] Mm-hmm. The amount of fuel measured is very precise.
translation.zh: ‎对所需燃料的测量是非常精确的

translation.en: If fuel is insufficient,
translation.zh: ‎假如燃料不足

translation.en: the rocket returns to Earth without reaching orbit.
translation.zh: ‎火箭还没上轨道就得返回地球

translation.en: Where you from, Chan?
translation.zh: ‎你是哪里人啊 陈？

translation.en: -Ohio. -Originally?
translation.zh:
‎-俄亥俄州
‎-出生地？

translation.en: What does that have to do with any-- Are--
translation.zh: ‎他出生在哪里又有什么关…

translation.en: Are you suggesting Chan is a Chinese spy?
translation.zh:
‎难道你是在暗示
‎陈是中国派来的间谍吗？

translation.en: Ah. So we have heard from Mr. Chan.
translation.zh: ‎那么 我们听完了陈先生的汇报

translation.en: -Doctor. -Dr. Chan.
translation.zh:
‎-博士
‎-陈博士

translation.en: I'd like to hear another opinion.
translation.zh: ‎我想听听别人的意见

translation.en: Perhaps somebody willing to dissent from the party line.
translation.zh: ‎也许有谁敢于持有跟集体相悖的观点

translation.en: Who'd like to give me a good reason why we should launch today?
translation.zh:
‎有谁能给我提供一个
‎我们今天应该发射的原因？

translation.en: Anyone?
translation.zh: ‎有人吗？

translation.en: So I can weigh the pros and cons?
translation.zh: ‎好让我来权衡一下利弊？

translation.en: Don't you have any mavericks on your team, Mallory?
translation.zh:
‎你的团队里就连一个
‎敢于反对的勇者也没有吗 马洛里？

translation.en: -I say launch. -Great.
translation.zh:
‎-要我说 应该发射
‎-太好了

translation.en: And you are Dr....
translation.zh: ‎你是哪位博士…

translation.en: Just call me Eddie.
translation.zh: ‎叫我埃迪就行

translation.en: -Oh, shit. -Ain't a doctor.
translation.zh:
‎-靠
‎-我不是医学博士

translation.en: I go to a bunch of 'em, though.
translation.zh: ‎不过我去看病时 倒见过不少

translation.en: Wonderful. So those in favor of postponement
translation.zh: ‎好极了 就是说赞成延期的

translation.en: are me and Dr. Chan, Dr. Swedberg,
translation.zh: ‎有我和陈博士 ‎斯维德伯格博士、博尔博士

translation.en: Dr. Bohr, Dr. Revredesh,
translation.zh: ‎斯维德伯格博士、博尔博士 ‎瑞福瑞德什博士、大和博士

translation.en: Dr. Yamato, Dr. Lowenstein,
translation.zh:
‎瑞福瑞德什博士、大和博士 ‎洛恩斯坦博士、华盛顿博士
‎还有齐斯克博士

translation.en: Dr. Washington, and Dr. Zisk.
translation.zh:
‎洛恩斯坦博士、华盛顿博士
‎还有齐斯克博士

translation.en: In favor of launch are you and Eddie.
translation.zh: ‎赞成发射的有你和埃迪

translation.en: Any last name, Eddie?
translation.zh: ‎有姓么 埃迪？

translation.en: None that I care to mention.
translation.zh: ‎我愿提的就没有

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: Chan, what's behind your back?
translation.zh: ‎陈 你背后藏了什么？

translation.en: It's an umbrella, sir.
translation.zh: ‎这是一把雨伞 长官

translation.en: Did you think it was a sword cane? Samurai sword?
translation.zh: ‎您以为这是刀柄吗 武士刀？

translation.en: Would you like to examine it, sir?
translation.zh: ‎要不… 您来亲自验验 长官？

translation.en: No, we are done here.
translation.zh: ‎不用了 我们到此为止

translation.en: [Mallory] So the launch is scrubbed?
translation.zh: ‎就是说发射取消了？

translation.en: I can't hear you over the rotors.
translation.zh: ‎旋翼太响了 我听不见你说什么

translation.en: -Well, this is absurd. -[chattering]
translation.zh: ‎这也太荒谬了

translation.en: So is this actually happening or not?
translation.zh: ‎今天到底发不发射啊？

translation.en: There's no point if it's not happening...
translation.zh: ‎如果不发射 我们就没必要…

translation.en: Excuse me, congresspeople.
translation.zh: ‎失陪一下 国会议员们

translation.en: Brad...
translation.zh: ‎布拉德…

translation.en: no interruptions for five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎给我五分钟 不许打扰

translation.en: [softly] ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪
translation.zh: ‎阿鲁巴 牙买加 喔 我好想带你去呀

translation.en: ♪ Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.zh: ‎百慕大 巴哈马 来吧 漂亮妈妈

translation.en: ♪ Key Largo, Montego Baby, why don't we go? ♪
translation.zh:
‎基拉戈 蒙特哥
‎宝贝 还不出发是为何？

translation.en: ♪ Jamaica, off the Florida keys ♪
translation.zh: ‎牙买加 在那佛罗里达群岛边呀

translation.en: ♪ There's a place called Kokomo ♪
translation.zh: ‎有个地方 名叫科科莫

translation.en: ♪ That's where you wanna go To get away from it all ♪
translation.zh:
‎那就是你想要去的角落
‎远离这尘世的纷扰

translation.en: ♪ Bodies in the sand ♪
translation.zh: ‎沙滩上的酮体呀一个个

translation.en: ♪ Tropical drinks melting in your hand ♪
translation.zh: ‎热带饮品正在你的手上融化着

translation.en: ♪ We'll be falling in love To the rhythm of a steel drum band ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们会听着钢鼓乐队的节奏
‎深深地坠入那爱河

translation.en: ♪ Down in Koko-- ♪
translation.zh: ‎就在那科科…

translation.en: They're gone.
translation.zh: ‎他们走了

translation.en: Congresspeople! Congresspeople!
translation.zh: ‎国会议员们！

translation.en: The launch is on.
translation.zh: ‎发射照常进行

translation.en: -What? -See you at 1700.
translation.zh:
‎-啥？
‎-我们幺拐洞洞见

translation.en: But you--
translation.zh: ‎可你…

translation.en: Sheila? Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎茜拉？是呀

translation.en: Okay. Okay, okay. Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好好好

translation.en: Don't, don't-- Please don't skitter away.
translation.zh: ‎别…请千万别溜走呀

translation.en: Please, this is for your own safety.
translation.zh:
‎求你们了
‎这是为你们自己的安全着想

translation.en: Come on. I'm trying to save you! Damn it, get back here.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 我这是在救你们呢！ ‎可恶！快回来！

translation.en: Our country, the oldest democracy in the world,
translation.zh: ‎我们这个有着 ‎世界上历史最悠久的民主制度的国家

translation.en: put a man on the moon.
translation.zh: ‎曾经将人送上了月球

translation.en: It was perhaps our greatest moment up until that point.
translation.zh: ‎在当时 ‎那可以算得上是我国最伟大的时刻

translation.en: Alongside the Constitution, the Bill of Rights,
translation.zh: ‎堪比撰写《宪法》 ‎与《权利法案》

translation.en: and, of course, the Miracle on Ice.
translation.zh: ‎当然还得算上冰上奇迹在内

translation.en: Today we launch Epsilon 6,
translation.zh: ‎今天我们要将艾瑟伦6号发射升空

translation.en: a collaborative effort between the scientists of the United States,
translation.zh: ‎这是一次各国共同合作的成果 ‎参与的众科学家来自美国、日本

translation.en: Japan, Europe, Turkey, Israel, Australia,
translation.zh:
‎参与的众科学家来自美国、日本 ‎欧洲、土耳其
‎以色列、澳大利亚

translation.en: -and our old enemy, Russia. -[phone camera clicks]
translation.zh: ‎还有我们的老冤家 俄国

translation.en: And this will bring us one step closer to returning to the moon,
translation.zh: ‎这将使我们离重返月球更近一步

translation.en: and, from there, to Mars.
translation.zh: ‎紧接着的 便是向火星进发

translation.en: There will be setbacks along the way.
translation.zh: ‎这一路上定然会遇上不少挫折

translation.en: There are risks to every great endeavor.
translation.zh: ‎每一项伟大的事业必将伴随着风险

translation.en: But greatness was never won without suffering.
translation.zh: ‎要成就伟大 是不可能不经历磨难的

translation.en: And sacrifice.
translation.zh: ‎也不可能没有牺牲

translation.en: I am so, so damn proud of all of you.
translation.zh: ‎我太…太为你们每一个人骄傲了

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, my God. He's really on the edge.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 他真快绷不住了

translation.en: [clears throat] So...
translation.zh: ‎那么…

translation.en: without further ado,
translation.zh: ‎闲话少说

translation.en: with this button,
translation.zh: ‎按下这个按钮

translation.en: I so launch...
translation.zh: ‎我便要发射…

translation.en: Epsilon 6.
translation.zh: ‎艾瑟伦6号

translation.en: -Liked the Miracle on Ice reference. -Thank you, Brad.
translation.zh:
‎-您提到了冰上奇迹 真棒
‎-谢谢你 布拉德

translation.en: Aw. I should be tweeting this.
translation.zh: ‎要是我能发推文该有多好啊

translation.en: Where'd it go?
translation.zh: ‎哪里去了？

translation.en: [whispering] What's going on? Did it blow up?
translation.zh: ‎出什么事了？爆炸了吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: ‎等等

translation.en: Epsilon 6 is in orbit.
translation.zh: ‎艾瑟伦6号进入轨道了

translation.en: Yeah, well, he'll probably have me transferred tomorrow
translation.zh: ‎是啊 唉 估计他明天就会把我调走了

translation.en: once he has a moment to think about it.
translation.zh: ‎等他空下来想到这件事

translation.en: [scoffs] But what was I supposed to do?
translation.zh: ‎可我还能怎么办呢？

translation.en: You put a helicopter down in the wrong spot,
translation.zh: ‎要是把直升飞机停错了地方

translation.en: and someone could get their head removed.
translation.zh: ‎搞不好会把别人的脑袋给削下来的

translation.en: Hang on a second, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 妈

translation.en: "Sorry I snapped at you. Glad you're on our team."
translation.zh:
‎“很抱歉我对你发了脾气
‎很高兴你能加入我们的团队”

translation.en: [Mallory] You know, there's one thing that I don't get.
translation.zh: ‎你知道么 有件事我怎么也想不明白

translation.en: You were right about the launch,
translation.zh: ‎发射的决定 是给你做对了

translation.en: yet you don't know anything about science.
translation.zh: ‎可你明明对科学一无所知啊

translation.en: Guess I know a little about people.
translation.zh: ‎看来我对人还是略有所知的

translation.en: When we we're out at the launch site, there were two tiny clouds in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎我们在发射场上那会儿 ‎天上明明只有两朵小云

translation.en: Chan had an umbrella.
translation.zh: ‎陈却带了把雨伞来

translation.en: People like that can't handle any risk at all.
translation.zh: ‎像这样的人 一点风险也承担不了

translation.en: There's no way we are getting back to the moon
translation.zh: ‎光靠这样的思维 我们要想重回月球

translation.en: with that kind of thinking.
translation.zh: ‎是绝对不可能的

translation.en: That's a good observation. Well reasoned.
translation.zh: ‎这个观察很到位 逻辑很缜密

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: ‎干杯

translation.en: Thank you, Doctor.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 博士

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着？

translation.en: Epsilon should be passing right about now.
translation.zh: ‎艾瑟伦现在应该正好从我们头上经过

translation.en: -[Mark sighs] -Do you see it?
translation.zh: ‎你看到了吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, there's a spark.
translation.zh: ‎噢 看到了 那边有个亮点

translation.en: Beautiful. Wow.
translation.zh: ‎真美啊 ‎哇喔

translation.en: [Mark] I got it.
translation.zh: ‎我看到了

translation.en: [Mallory] Wait, is that a second spark?
translation.zh: ‎等等 那边是不是有第二个亮点

translation.en: [inhaling sharply] Motherfucker!
translation.zh: ‎混账东西！

translation.en: ♪ Aruba, Jamaica Ooh, I wanna take ya ♪  ♪ To Bermuda, Bahama Come on, pretty mama ♪
translation.zh: ‎（深切怀念佛莱德·威拉特）

translation.en: ♪ I want to take you down to Kokomo ♪
translation.zh: ‎字幕翻译：Yi Ding
